name: Mage: 2D sidescroller
description:
This is a game I made for a college class in 2018. I fixed some small bugs before I uploaded but otherwise levels 6-8 are unfinished. 

Controls:

  • W/D to move (left and right)
  • Arrow Keys to aim
  • Space to shoot
  • Tab to switch spells

Known Bugs:

  • Levels 6-8 unfinished.
  • Control Screen doesn't work.

My Accomplishments when making this game:

  • My first 2D Tile spread sheet based game.
  • First attempt at a saving system.
